tuur.name: readme.txt
tuur.text:
README.txt

Welcome to User's Project!
======================

This project is designed for testing purposes.
It contains random data, code snippets, and other useful resources.

Files:
------
- README.txt -> This file, providing an overview of the project.
- sample_code.js -> Contains JavaScript code examples.
- data.csv -> Stores some sample data used for testing.

Usage:
------
1. Clone the repository.
2. Run the provided scripts to test the functionality.
3. Explore the code and make modifications as needed.

Contact:
--------
If you have any questions or issues, please reach out via email or open an issue in the repository.

Enjoy!

guest.name: pssst.txt
guest.text:
You don’t need to know who I am.
There are a lot of users on this system and I managed to get into one.
The username is ‘azerty’ and the password is the other keyboard layout! If you can’t figure this out, it isn’t meant for you...
I think I found some leaks in the system files. Not all of them are encrypted correctly. You’ll probably find them too. I trust in you.
(Remember that passwords are case sensitive!)
See you soon.
- mouse
